info.name: Airbyte STG
info.description:
clone the [airbyte repo](https://github.com/airbytehq/airbyte), spin it up and setup a workspace on `localhost:8000`

in this collection you can find the needed endpoints to integrate a CSV file into a target database (postgres)

request.description:
create source:

*   takes a sourceDefinitionId (connector Id eg: file, cloud, ..etc)
*   connectionConfiguration where the object stored and what protocol is used to access it
*   workspaceId: some already existing workspace
*   name
list all source definitions in a workspace (airbyte connectors)
all defined destinations in a workspace (defined by consumer)
create a destination from a destination definition takes configurations related to the destination definition
create a connection between a source and destination takes the sync catalog (schema of the source)
trigger a sync for a certain connection
